5#ifndef V8_HEAP_CPPGC_CAGED_HEAP_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_CPPGC_CAGED_HEAP_H_
7
8#include <limits>
9#include <memory>
10
11#include "include/cppgc/internal/caged-heap.h"
12#include "include/cppgc/platform.h"
13#include "src/base/bounded-page-allocator.h"
14#include "src/base/lazy-instance.h"
15#include "src/base/platform/mutex.h"
16#include "src/heap/cppgc/globals.h"
17#include "src/heap/cppgc/virtual-memory.h"
18
19namespace cppgc {
20namespace internal {
21
22namespace testing {
23class TestWithHeap;
24}
25
26class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE CagedHeap final {
27 public:
28 using AllocatorType = v8::base::BoundedPageAllocator;
29
30 template <typename RetType = uintptr_t>
31 static RetType OffsetFromAddress(const void* address) {
32 static_assert(std::numeric_limits<RetType>::max() >=
33 (api_constants::kCagedHeapMaxReservationSize - 1),
34 "The return type should be large enough");
35 return reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(address) &
36 (api_constants::kCagedHeapReservationAlignment - 1);
37 }
38
39 static uintptr_t BaseFromAddress(const void* address) {
40 return reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(address) &
41 ~(api_constants::kCagedHeapReservationAlignment - 1);
42 }
43
44 static void InitializeIfNeeded(PageAllocator& platform_allocator,
45 size_t desired_heap_size);
46
47 static void CommitAgeTable(PageAllocator& platform_allocator);
48
49 static CagedHeap& Instance();
50
51 CagedHeap(const CagedHeap&) = delete;
52 CagedHeap& operator=(const CagedHeap&) = delete;
53
54 AllocatorType& page_allocator() { return *page_bounded_allocator_; }
55 const AllocatorType& page_allocator() const {
56 return *page_bounded_allocator_;
57 }
58
59 bool IsOnHeap(const void* address) const {
60 DCHECK_EQ(reserved_area_.address(),
61 reinterpret_cast<void*>(CagedHeapBase::GetBase()));
62 return reinterpret_cast<void*>(BaseFromAddress(address)) ==
63 reserved_area_.address();
64 }
65
66 void* base() const { return reserved_area_.address(); }
67
68 private:
69 friend class v8::base::LeakyObject<CagedHeap>;
70 friend class testing::TestWithHeap;
71
72 explicit CagedHeap(PageAllocator& platform_allocator,
73 size_t desired_heap_size);
74
75 static CagedHeap* instance_;
76
77 const VirtualMemory reserved_area_;
78 // BoundedPageAllocator is thread-safe, no need to use external
79 // synchronization.
80 std::unique_ptr<AllocatorType> page_bounded_allocator_;
81};
82
83} // namespace internal
84} // namespace cppgc
85
86#endif // V8_HEAP_CPPGC_CAGED_HEAP_H_
